entry.title: Helen discusses blending Vietnamese and American culture

media:group.media:title: Helen discusses blending Vietnamese and American culture
media:group.media:description:
Helen, a “Being Asian in America” documentary participant, discusses how she wants to teach her children both American and Vietnamese traditions so they can know both and choose which is best for them in life.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Diane discusses the impact of the model minority myth

media:group.media:title: Diane discusses the impact of the model minority myth
media:group.media:description:
Diane, a “Being Asian in America” documentary participant, discusses the impact of the model minority myth and the effect it’s had on her self-esteem.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Shahid talks about his pride in being Pakistani American

media:group.media:title: Shahid talks about his pride in being Pakistani American
media:group.media:description:
Shahid, a “Being Asian in America” documentary participant, talks about the pride he feels being Pakistani American and how he’s been able to make his dreams come true in the U.S.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Surinder talks about how ignorance and misinformation can cause people to hide their identity

media:group.media:title: Surinder talks about how ignorance and misinformation can cause people to hide their identity
media:group.media:description:
Surinder, a “Being Asian in America” documentary participant, talks about his experience working with youth who have decided to give up their Sikh identity in order to fit in and avoid contentious encounters.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Tokiko recounts her experience being detained as a Japanese American during WWII

media:group.media:title: Tokiko recounts her experience being detained as a Japanese American during WWII
media:group.media:description:
Tokiko, a “Being Asian in America” documentary participant, recounts her early memories of being detained with her family during WWII.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Brent discusses navigating his American identity while living in Asia

media:group.media:title: Brent discusses navigating his American identity while living in Asia
media:group.media:description:
Brent, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, discusses navigating his American identity while living abroad in Asia.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Pa Houa discusses being Hmong American

media:group.media:title: Pa Houa discusses being Hmong American
media:group.media:description:
Pa Houa, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, discusses being Hmong American and what differentiates Hmong people from other Asian groups.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Mali discusses how Asian Americans are all unique and different

media:group.media:title: Mali discusses how Asian Americans are all unique and different
media:group.media:description:
Mali, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, discusses how Asian Americans all are unique and come from different cultures and backgrounds. She also talks about what makes Lao Americans distinct from other groups.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Angel discusses the importance of speaking Chinese with her children

media:group.media:title: Angel discusses the importance of speaking Chinese with her children
media:group.media:description:
Angel, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, discusses why she speaks only Chinese with her children and the importance of them learning both English and Chinese.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Diane discusses the importance of her grandmother in persevering her Chinese culture

media:group.media:title: Diane discusses the importance of her grandmother in persevering her Chinese culture
media:group.media:description:
Diane, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, discusses the importance of her grandmother in her learning Chinese and persevering her Chinese culture.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Buntha discusses navigating language barriers in the hospital

media:group.media:title: Buntha discusses navigating language barriers in the hospital
media:group.media:description:
Buntha, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, discusses navigating language barriers in the hospital after he had a severe head injury at work.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Brent discusses the differences between living in Arkansas, Asia and the New York metropolitan area

media:group.media:title: Brent discusses the differences between living in Arkansas, Asia and the New York metropolitan area
media:group.media:description:
Brent, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, discusses the differences between growing up in Arkansas, living in major U.S. cities like New York, San Francisco and Dallas, and spending 15 years overseas, mainly in Asia.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Shahid recounts the racism his family experienced after 9/11

media:group.media:title: Shahid recounts the racism his family experienced after 9/11
media:group.media:description:
Shahid, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, recounts the racism his family experienced in the aftermath of 9/11.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica

entry.title: Helen recounts her experience escaping Vietnam on a boat before settling in the U.S.

media:group.media:title: Helen recounts her experience escaping Vietnam on a boat before settling in the U.S.
media:group.media:description:
Helen, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, recounts her experience escaping Vietnam with her sister on a boat to Thailand before settling in the U.S.
This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4
For more on the project, visit www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica
